EmailTemplate.subject: Major Discount on S500 Servers
EmailTemplate.textOnly: March 11, 2021 NCR is Offering Discount on S500 Servers! NCR has approximately 600 new S500 servers that we are offering at a deeply discounted price of over 50% off the MRP (list price). These S500 servers are brand new, in the box, and will come with Windows 10 licenses, setting them up for a long product lifecycle. They function perfectly and are only being discounted due to the introduction of the S600 server class. Also, all of these new S500 servers come with a standard 1-year hardware warranty. This limited supply of servers will be sold on a “first come- first serve” basis, so get your orders in today to take advantage of the discount! The S500 servers have been set up with the discounted price in the channel partners’ catalog. The two PID’s and their sales prices are listed below. To place an order, follow the normal process for ordering any other product. For any questions, contact Austin.Anderson@NCR.com .
